description: Statement maker: our Mia Jean in stretch denim, with graphic mosaics of raffia, seed beads, wooden rounds and cascades of fringe, tipped with genuine seashells at the hem. It has a high rise and a modern slim fit.
Zipper fly with enameled button at center front
Front rise: 9" (22.6 cm); back rise: 13.5" (33.9 cm); inseam: 25" (62.7 cm)
title: MIA JEAN

description: Now offered in denim, our Vanner Jean is a fresh take on one of our best-selling pant styles. It combines sculpting lines with great comfort and hold, cut with a flat front, a slit back pocket and a cropped hem that’s perfect for highlighting your favorite footwear.
Zip fly and button closure at center front
Front rise: 10.13" (25.4 cm); back rise: 14.38" (36.1 cm); inseam: 29" (72.8 cm)
title: Vanner Jean

description: Chic and understated, our pull-on Brooke Slouchy Boot updates a favorite minimalist style in soft napa leather, designed to scrunch around the calf. Endlessly versatile, with a tiny logo on the block heel, it goes with everything from slim jeans to skirts.
title: BROOKE SLOUCHY BOOT

description: Pattern play. Color-blocks, crisp borders and geometric prints join the graphic mix on our Greer Cardigan — a nod to legendary designer David Hicks. Seen on the runway, it’s knit from spun silk, contrasted with printed satin front panels.
Mother-of-pearl button closure at center front
title: GREER CARDIGAN

description: Raw meets refined. Our Emery Cardigan is an elevated take on an everyday knit layer, embellished with tiny beads, wooden squares and faceted stones. It offers an effortless straight fit in soft merino wool, finished with a streamlined row of hook-and-eye closures.
title: EMERY CARDIGAN

description: Colorful, soft-focus stripes create a modern tie-dye effect on our Fiona Pant, a standout piece from the runway. The style sculpts a slouchy, easy-fitting silhouette in twill fabric with a high waist and a sweeping wide leg.
title: FIONA PANT

description: A new take on one of our most iconic styles. The Embellished Tory Tunic is dressed up for the season with embroidery inspired by traditional Romanian needlework and hand-beading on cotton poplin. Finished with a discreet on-seam zipper, it’s a classic staple of everyday and getaway dressing.
title: EMBELLISHED TORY TUNIC

description: Our silk Brigitte Romper is printed with a geometric diamond motif inspired by Moroccan tapestry. This play on one of our design signatures can be worn as a cover-up or a tailored one-piece — easily transitioning from beach days to brunch.
title: BRIGITTE ROMPER

description: Named for Tory’s parents — Buddy and Reva Robinson — it’s a modern classic. Printed with irises, our Robinson Floral Zip Continental Wallet is designed with lots of pockets and a long shape that fits all full-length bills without folding.
12 credit card slots, 1 zipper compartment, 2 bill pockets
title: ROBINSON FLORAL ZIP CONTINENTAL WALLET

description: Suede placket with snap closures at center front
title: RORY SWEATER COAT

description: Our plaid Gwen Coat is great for between-season weather. Made in Italy from merino wool, it has a generous silhouette, with patch pockets, fringe trims and a draped overlay that can be styled as a scarf.

description: A little him, a little her. Crafted in a mid-weight wool blend, our Holt Coat features a classic windowpane check, giving it a fresh, modern feel. It’s finished with crisp lapels, lacquered buttons and patch pockets.

description: Pattern play. Color-blocks, crisp borders and geometric prints join the graphic mix on our Greer Cardigan — a nod to legendary designer David Hicks. Seen on the runway, it’s knit from spun silk, contrasted with printed satin front panels.

description: Relaxed and breezy, our Faye Culotte’s wide-leg shape sways as you walk. Worn on the runway, the pleated pair is softly tailored in fluid crepe de chine.

description: A new take on one of our most iconic styles.
